description:
This performance half-rope is also fully certified for use as a twin. While it might be skinny, the Dyad is designed to offer the right balance between diameter and weight. Its sleekness and ability to be clipped as a half or twin, reduces rope drag on long pitches, making it an excellent choice for ice, wandering rock routes, and alpine adventures.

  • XEROS permanent dry treatment is applied to nylon filaments before they're twisted into yarns. This results in less water absorption through the entire rope and prevents freezing in cold environments
  • Made with PFOA-free, PFAS-free, and bluesign® certified raw materials
  • Designed as a half or twin rope so must be used in pairs
  • Meets testing standards for half, and twin ropes
  • Specs shown are for use as a half rope
  • When used as a twin rope, the specs are as follows (based on tests with 2 strands): Dynamic elongation: 25% Static elongation: 3.3% Impact force: 9.7kN UIAA fall rating: 17
name: Sterling Rope Dyad 7.7mm XEROS Dry Rope
